description: Salty halloumi pairs perfectly with lamb and charred zucchinis for a kebab with a difference.
name: BBQ Lamb, Zucchini & Halloumi Kebabs Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium red onion, peeled and chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Place the lamb mince in a large bowl and add the garlic, mint and lemon zest. Mix well to combine and roll into 16 small meatballs. Place on a plate and into the fridge to firm up.
Soak 8 wooden skewers in cold water for 30 minutes, then thread with chopped zucchini, red onion, meatballs and halloumi.
In a small bowl, mix the olive oil, lemon juice and honey and brush on to the skewers.
Heat the barbecue and place the skewers on the grill for 45 minutes on each side until caramelised and cooked through.
